sentence: For a better overview, the main mechanisms of exomiRNAs in modulating pathogenesis of hematologic neoplasms is summarized in Fig. 1.
The potential of exomiRNAs in developing biomarkers and diagnostics of hematologic neoplasms are illustrated in Fig. 2.
The different therapeutic approaches of miRNA using exosomes are illustrated in Fig. 3.
